card.name: Greater Masticore
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, discard your hand. {2}: Greater Masticore deals 1 damage to each other creature. {6}, Exile six other cards from your graveyard: Return Greater Masticore from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Martoob, Blessing of Water
card.text: Flying Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced. At the beginning of each end step, if you control no untapped lands, transform Martoob, Blessing of Water. --- (Back): Tamaak, Drought of Life

card.name: Tamaak, Drought of Life
card.text: Flying Whenever a player taps a land for mana, return that land to its owner's hand unless they pay 1 life. At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent controls no tapped lands, transform Tamaak, Drought of Life. --- (Front): Martoob, Blessing of Water

card.name: Mahara, the Universal
card.text: Indestructible Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Mahara, recruit. (Create a 0/0 white Soldier Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.) At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures, transform Mahara. --- (Back): Andazir, the Crownless

card.name: Andazir, the Crownless
card.text: Protection from instants and from sorceries At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice another creature. For each creature sacrificed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Andazir, the Crownless. At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or fewer creatures, transform Andazir. --- (Front): Mahara, the Universal

card.name: Rahstahde, Word of Truth
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, draw a card. At the beginning of your end step, if you have four or more cards in hand, transform Rahstahde. --- (Back): Fahrib, Tale of Deceit

card.name: Fahrib, Tale of Deceit
card.text: Hexproof Discard two cards: You may cast target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard this turn. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. At the beginning of your end step, if you have two or fewer cards in hand, transform Fahrib. --- (Front): Rahstahde, Word of Truth

card.name: Kahroba, Forefather of All
card.text: If a creature would die, exile it instead with an ancestry counter on it. Kahroba gets +X/+X, where X is the total power of creature cards exiled with ancestry counters on them. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more cards exiled with ancestry counters on them, transform Kahroba. --- (Back): Atieh, Savior of Destiny

card.name: Atieh, Savior of Destiny
card.text: Flying, hexproof At the beginning of your end step, put an exiled card with an ancestry counter on it on the bottom of its owner's library, then scry 2. If there is exactly one card exiled with an ancestry counter on it, transform Atieh. --- (Front): Kahroba, Forefather of All

card.name: Sahra, the Consuming
card.text: Trample, haste When Sahra, the Consuming enters or attacks, sacrifice a permanent. At the beginning of your end step, transform Sahra unless you've sacrificed two or more permanents this turn. --- (Back): Cyrukan, the Vast

card.name: Cyrukan, the Vast
card.text: Indestructible Whenever Cyrukan attacks, choose one — • Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") • Create a Weapon token and attach it to target creature you control. (It's an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.") At the beginning of each end step, if you control three or more tokens, transform Cyrukan. --- (Front): Sahra, the Consuming

card.name: Muktann Protectors
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 2/1 white Sand creature token with flying. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 3/1 red Sand creature token with haste. Whenever you cast an enchantment or artifact spell, create a 2/2 blue Sand creature token with hexproof. Whenever a land you control enters, create a 3/3 green Sand creature token.

card.name: Twice Blessed
card.text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead. If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead. If you tap a permanent for mana, it produces twice as much of that mana instead.

card.name: All-Encompassing Akvan
card.text: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Noncreature spells you cast cost {X} less to cast, where X is All-Encompassing Akvan's power.

card.name: Hadak, End of Progress
card.text: Flying If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to a permanent or player, you may have it deal damage equal to Hadak's power instead.

card.name: Tempting Shahmaran
card.text: When Tempting Shahmaran enters, gain control of target creature. Untap it and it gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, exile that creature and put X +1/+1 counters on Tempting Shahmaran, where X is that creature's power. Tempting Shahmaran has all activated abilities of cards exiled with it.

card.name: Decanter of Endless Rivers
card.text: {T}: Put a flood counter on Decanter of Endless Rivers. Add {U} for each flood counter on it.

card.name: Sword of Fanaticism
Shomi's Savior
card.text: Flying When Shomi's Savior enters, scry 3, then you gain 3 life. Whenever you scry, put a +1/+1 counter on Shomi's Savior.

card.name: Chosen of Aminatou
card.text: Flash Flying, lifelink, deathtouch When Chosen of Aminatou enters, scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Supreme Alchemist
card.text: You may sacrifice three Treasures rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Flying, trample, haste

card.name: Guardian of the Devout
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Guardian of the Devout attacks or blocks, other creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Cyrukan's Messenger
card.text: Flying When Cyrukan's Messenger enters, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Whenever Cyrukan's Messenger attacks, you may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield attached to Cyrukan's Messenger.

card.name: Nizev Enforcer
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) At the beginning of your end step, if you've cast three or more spells this turn and Nizev Enforcer isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Tamaak's Devourer
card.text: Flying, trample If a creature card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it with a soul counter on it instead. Whenever Tamaak's Devourer deals combat damage to a player, put a creature card exiled with a soul counter on it onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Deprived Div
card.text: First strike Whenever Deprived Div deals combat damage to an opponent, end the turn. (Creatures without first strike won't deal damage this turn.)

card.name: Dunesea Captain
card.text: Menace Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. They lose life equal to that card's mana value.

card.name: Zareen's Pariah
card.text: Zareen's Pariah is all colors. Flying During each of your turns, you may cast a spell of each color from your graveyard.

card.name: Zenith of Greed
card.text: Flying When Zenith of Greed enters, search your library for up to two cards named Treasure Hoard and put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Imposing Databdara
card.text: Flash First strike When Imposing Databdara enters, return each other creature with toughness less than or equal to the number of Satrapies you control to their owners' hands.

card.name: Div of Bonded Souls
card.text: When Div of Bonded Souls enters, create a 1/1 colorless Illusion creature token with "This creature is every creature type." Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.

card.name: Travelling Bazaar
card.text: Creatures you control have "When this creature becomes tapped for the first time during each of your turns, untap it." {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Illusion of the Div
card.text: You may have Illusion of the Div enter as a copy of any creature you control except it has "{G}{U}{B}, Discard a card: Create a tapped token that is a copy of this creature."

card.name: Recreator of Myths
card.text: Flying, lifelink Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Recreator of Myths attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard. If you do, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves.

card.name: Ghul of Forgotten Pasts
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Ghul of Forgotten Pasts dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control. You gain life equal to that card's mana value.

card.name: Shared Honor
card.text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, put that many +1/+1 counters on each creature you control instead.

card.name: Boon of the Pacts
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a non-Snake creature or Boon of the Pacts. Then create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Triplicate
card.text: Copy target spell twice. You may choose new targets for the copies. (A copy of a permanent spell enters as a token.)

card.name: Endless Infantry
card.text: Whenever an Army you control dies, if it wasn't sacrificed, recruit. (Create a 0/0 white Soldier Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.)

card.name: Lasting Legacy
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it except it is an enchantment. (It still has its abilities, but it's not a creature or other types.)

card.name: Bane of Endless Snakes
card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of each end step, create X 1/1 green Snake creature tokens, where X is the amount of life enchanted player lost this turn.

card.name: Unsustainable Consumption
card.text: Whenever a land becomes tapped, its controller sacrifices it and creates a Treasure token.

card.name: Martoob's Message
card.text: Double the number of each kind of counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Cosmic Coalescing
card.text: Cosmic Coalescing deals X damage to any target. You may reveal a noncreature card with mana value X or less you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. X can't be 0. Exile Cosmic Coalescing.

card.name: Contemplate the Cosmos
card.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You gain 2 life. Monument {2}{W}{U} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Orrey of the Cosmos

card.name: Orrey of the Cosmos
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1, then you gain 1 life. --- (Front): Contemplate the Cosmos

card.name: Delve for Treasures
card.text: Repeat the following process X times. Reveal the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Fight for Succession
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Monument {W}{B} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Chalice of Fallen Foes

card.name: Chalice of Fallen Foes
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. --- (Front): Fight for Succession

card.name: Cosmic Lineage
card.text: You may reveal any number of creature cards you own from outside the game with the same name and put them into your hand. Exile Cosmic Lineage.

card.name: Peer into the Cosmos
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell. • Peer into the Cosmos deals 3 damage to target creature. • Until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead. Monument {1}{U}{R}{W} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Bauble of Infinites

card.name: Bauble of Infinites
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Bauble of Infinites deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life. --- (Front): Peer into the Cosmos

card.name: Forced Germination
card.text: Counter target spell. If a permanent spell is countered this way, create a token that's a copy of that card except it's a colorless creature, it's 2/2, and it's a Plant in addition to its other types.

card.name: Assault of the Conscripted
card.text: Recruit X times. You lose X life. (To recruit, create a 0/0 white Soldier Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.)

card.name: Shrine to Those Gone
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color unless you control a permanent of that color. Spend this mana only to cast a permanent spell.

card.name: Marketplace Crossroads
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Tap five untapped Satrapies you control: Add six mana in any combination of colors.

card.name: The Blacksmith's Banner
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put a unity counter on The Blacksmith's Banner. Creatures you control have vigilance and get +1/+1 for each unity counter on The Blacksmith's Banner.

card.name: Shapur, the Fifth Shah
card.text: When Shapur, the Fifth Shah enters, exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast that card. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. Monument {4}{R} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Lamp of Endless Possibilities

card.name: Lamp of Endless Possibilities
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. --- (Front): Shapur, the Fifth Shah

card.name: The Grand Simurgh
card.text: Flying When you cast The Grand Simurgh, search your graveyard and the top five cards of your library for any number of nonlegendary creature cards with total mana value 5 or less and put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Saeedi Kahroba, Daughter
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Saeedi Kahroba, Daughter attacks, recruit. (Create a 0/0 white Soldier Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.)

card.name: Tyrus, Giver to All
card.text: Flash When Tyrus, Giver to All enters and at the beginning of combat on your turn, for each counter on permanents you control, you may move that counter from that permanent to another permanent you control.

card.name: Reha, Entropy's Call
card.text: When Reha, Entropy's Call enters, you may search your library for any number of land cards with different names and exile them with harvest counters, then shuffle. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a card that you own in exile with a harvest counter on it at random onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Golna, the First Shah
card.text: When Golna, the First Shah enters, create Shir, a legendary 3/3 white Cat creature token with trample. Monument {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): The Path of Greatness

card.name: The Path of Greatness
card.text: Creatures you control have trample, haste, and hexproof. {2}{G}{G}: Create a 2/2 white Cat creature token. --- (Front): Golna, the First Shah

card.name: Jahan, the Third Shah
card.text: When Jahan, the Third Shah enters, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw three cards. Monument {3}{U}{U} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Cup of Jahan

card.name: Cup of Jahan
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library. {T}: You may play the top card of your library. --- (Front): Jahan, the Third Shah

card.name: Zareen, the Second Shah
card.text: When Zareen, the Second Shah enters, search your library for a creature card with mana value 2 or less or a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Monument {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Throne of Soli

card.name: Throne of Soli
card.text: Each creature you control enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Each planeswalker you control enters with an additional loyalty counter on it. --- (Front): Zareen, the Second Shah

card.name: Veeni, High Truthseeker
card.text: Haste Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) If casting a noncreature spell would cause an ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Thief of Mortals
card.text: Flying When Thief of Mortals deals combat damage to a player, as long as you control Thief of Mortals, gain control of target nonland permanent that player controls, and that permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Tap it. At the beginning of each end step, if you control five or more permanents you don't own, you win the game.

card.name: Siaveed, Commander of Armies
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose life equal to the number of Armies you control, then recruit. (Create a 0/0 white Soldier Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.)

card.name: Ghulish Unearthing
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn. Monument {3}{B}{R} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Obelisk of Absolute Rule

card.name: Obelisk of Absolute Rule
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, judge target creature you control. (Honor it by putting a +1/+1 counter on it or condemn it by sacrificing it to draw a card.) --- (Front): Ghulish Unearthing

card.name: Venture into the Muktann
card.text: Each player chooses an artifact or enchantment they control, then sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Return to the Beginning
card.text: Destroy all creatures, then return all nonland permanents to their owner's hands.

card.name: Judgment of the Soul
card.text: Judge target creature you control. If you honored it, it deals damage to each other creature equal to its power. If you condemned it, return up to two creature cards with lesser mana value than the sacrificed creature from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Honor it by putting a +1/+1 counter on it or condemn it by sacrificing it to draw a card.)

card.name: The Tale of Kings
card.text: For each legendary permanent you control, this spell costs one mana of one of that permanent's colors less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. For each color, create a token that's a copy of a different legendary permanent you control of that color, except the token isn't legendary. Exile The Tale of Kings.

card.name: Shala's Immolation
card.text: Shala's Immolation deals 5 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Adventurer's Amulet
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice Adventurer's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land or Satrapy card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Adventurous Impulse
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.text: When Caravan Guard enters, for each kind of counter on target permanent, put another counter of that kind on it or remove one from it.

card.name: Ironhide Hadhayosh
card.text: Trample When Ironhide Hadhayosh dies, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Sahra's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owner's hands. • Any number of target players each sacrifice a creature. • Any number of target players each sacrifice a planeswalker. • Any number of target players each sacrifice an artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Kahroba's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player creates three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. • Destroy target creature if its mana value is equal to or less than the number of creatures you control. • Target opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control and you gain that much life. • Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.

card.name: Martoob's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Until end of turn if an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. • Create three 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. • Create a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying. • Create a 3/3 red Manticore creature token with haste.

card.name: Mahara's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. • Return up to two target enchantment cards from your graveyard to your hand. • Return up to two target artifact cards from your graveyard to your hand. • Target player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Rahstahde's Command
card.text: Choose two — • Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way. • Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn. • Rahstahde's Command deals damage to each creature equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn. • Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each card you've drawn this turn.

card.name: Soli Citadel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Satrapies you control have "{1}{W}, {T}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token."

card.name: Nizev Citadel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Satrapies you control have "{U}, {T}: Each opponent mills a card.

card.name: Kaneh Citadel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Satrapies you control have "{1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life."

card.name: Avaz Citadel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Satrapies you control have "{1}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

card.name: Danaj Citadel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Satrapies you control have "{1}{G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Suhra and Fori, Grand Viziers
card.text: Flying Whenever you honor a creature, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Whenever you condemn a creature, each opponent loses life equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Maaru, Tomb Guardian
card.text: When Maaru, Tomb Guardian enters, create three Treasure tokens. Each Treasure you control is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of Treasures you control.

card.name: Artiaburz, Granter of Boons
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a token that is a copy of target Aura you control and attach it to target permanent or player it could enchant. {2}, Sacrifice an Aura: Artiaburz gains indestructible and hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Omid, the Undefeated
card.text: Flying Whenever Omid enters or one or more Armies you control attack, recruit. (Create a 0/0 white Soldier Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.)

card.name: Angel of Infinite Faces
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.

card.name: Seize Dominance
card.text: For any number of permanent types, you may exchange control of two target permanents that share that type.

card.name: Call of Piruz
card.text: {W}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle. {3}{B}{R}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

card.name: Bulwark of Tradition
card.text: Flying Whenever a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability you don't control, choose one — • Create a 3/3 red Manticore creature token. • Create two Treasure tokens. • Draw a card.

card.name: Div of the Endless Thought
card.text: Flying Div of the Endless Thought has all activated and triggered abilities of all other permanents on the battlefield.

card.name: Nakia, Infinity Seer
card.text: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) At the beginning of each end step, scry X, you gain X life, and Nakia, Infinity Seer deals X damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker, where X is the number of noncreature spells you've cast this turn.

card.name: Manticore ALK
card.text: Haste

card.name: blue Bird ALK
card.text: Flying

card.name: Angel ALK
card.text: Flying

card.name: Treasure 2 ALK
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Satrapy General
card.text: Flying Tap three untapped Satrapies you control: Recruit. Activate only as a sorcery. (Create a 0/0 white Soldier Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.)

card.name: Satrapy Merchant
card.text: Flash Satrapies you control have "{T}: Draw a card."

card.name: Satrapy Overseer
card.text: Flying Tap three untapped Satrapies you control: You may cast target card from your graveyard. Pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Satrapy Protector
card.text: Flying Tap five untapped Satrapies you control: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Satrapy Courier
card.text: Vigilance Satrapies you control have "{T}: Add {C}{C}."

card.name: Hidden Garden Entrance
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Hidden Garden Entrance: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Monument {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} (You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Cosmic Contraption

card.name: Cosmic Contraption
card.text: When Cosmic Contraption enters or leaves the battlefield, you may reveal a noncreature card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. --- (Front): Hidden Garden Entrance

card.name: Aminatou, Justicar
card.text: Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard. Create a 1/1 white Insect creature token with flying.

card.name: Emblem ALK
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Cleric ALK
card.text: Lifelink
